USA: The Maryland Toleration Act was passed.
The execution of the English King Charles I of England caused the establishment of the Commonwealth of England.
Russia: A zemsky sobor ratified a new legal code, the Sobornoye Ulozheniye.
Poland: Coronation of John II Casimir Vasa
Signing of the Treaty of Zboriv
Cuba: An epidemic kills a third of the island's population.
Brazil: Second Battle of Guararapes: Decisive Portuguese victory against the Dutch in the northeast of Brazil.
